title.narrative: Technical Assistance in support of Bangladesh Education Development Programme (BEDP)

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance in support of Bangladesh Education Development Programme (BEDP)) is a component of Bangladesh Education Development Programme (BEDP). reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Non-budget support financial aid' and a budget of £1,844,726. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Education facilities and training, Primary education. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, DAI Europe, International Bank for Reconstruction and Development, Mott MacDonald Limited, Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 01-07-2011 and the end date is 31-12-2017.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
